column5: Did anyone catch Classics Patterns on WFN on thursday? That was probobly the best fishing show episode Ive ever seen. It was kevin vandam smallmouth fishing, i dont think ive ever seen a half hour tv show with that much info in it.
true, i just saw it today, great info about lures,speed and places.

classic patterns is my favorite fishing show, and KVD is really one of the elite fishermen of today.  they have a DVD set of 13 Classic Pattern episodes and I'm strongly considering buying it off of WFN
